name: Springing Santa
description:
The evil elf's have stole all the candy canes. So now Santa has to fight through all the evil elf's to get back the candy canes and save Christmas.

Pause the game with the P key.

Use any key or touch the screen to make Santa jump.

Avoid the evil elf's and snowballs.

Jump on the elf's and snowballs to remove them
